data.title: Jason Alexander Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Jason Alexander on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Jason Alexander including Pretty Woman, Rodgers & Hammerstein's Cinderelâ¦
data.text:
The One Where Rosita Dies

On her first day as a telemarketer, Phoebe encounters a distraught man (Jason Alexander) who is determined to end his life.

Masterpiece

When a narcissistic psychopath confesses he has killed seven people and more will die, the team must locate his latest victims before it is too late.

Seven Deadly Sins and a Small Carl Sagan

Mary clashes with Sheldonâs drama teacher, Mr. Lundy (returning guest star JASON ALEXANDER) over plans for a Halloween haunted house fundraiser for the church. Also, Georgie falls for a rebellious teenage girl that Sheldon is tutoring.

Killer Asteroids, Oklahoma, and a Frizzy Hair Machine

A disappointing loss at the science fair sends Sheldonâs life in a new direction. JASON ALEXANDER guest stars as Sheldonâs drama teacher, Mr. Lundy.
